vthin3d.c File Reference

vthin3d - 3D topological thinning. More...

Detailed Description

vthin3d - 3D topological thinning.

Description
3D topological thinning. The input image must be binary.
Reference
Y.F. Tsao, K.S. Fu (1981). "A parallel thinning algorithm for 3D pictures", Computer Graphics Image Proc., Vol. 17, pp.315--331.
Usage
vthin3d
Parameters:
-in  input image
-out  output image
Examples

Known bugs
none.
Author:
G.Lohmann, MPI-CBS, 2004
